p: The synthetic strategies designed for the preparation of the target final compounds ( 5a-g, 7a-h and 13a-b) were illustrated in Schemes 1â€“3. In Scheme 1, bromobenzofuran-2-carbohydrazide 3 was prepared via reaction of ethylbromacetate with 5-bromosalicylaldehyde 1 in acetonitrile to furnish ethyl 5-bromobenzofuran-2-carboxylate 2. Thereafter, the ester functionality was subjected to hydrazinolysis via refluxing hydrazine hydrate to afford the key intermediate hydrazide 3, further; this key intermediate 3 was condensed with different isatin derivatives 4a-g in absolute ethyl alcohol with catalytic drops of glacial acetic acid to get the final novel compounds 5a-g.
